017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.xml.builder;
019
020import static java.lang.String.format;
021import static java.util.Objects.hash;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNonNullArgument;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNotEmptyArgument;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.xml.builder.XMLBuilderUtils.getPrefixValidator;
026
027import java.io.Serial;
028import java.io.Serializable;
029import java.net.URI;
030import java.net.URISyntaxException;
031import java.util.Optional;
032
033import org.apiguardian.api.API;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.xml.builder.spi.InvalidXMLNameException;
036
037/**
038 *  The definition of an XML namespace entry.
039 *
040 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
041 *  @version $Id: Namespace.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
042 *  @since 0.0.5
043 */
044@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Namespace.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $" )
045@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
046public final class Namespace implements Serializable, Comparable<Namespace>
047{
048        /*-----------*\
049    ====** Constants **========================================================
050        \*-----------*/
051    /**
052     *  The keyword for a namespace definition: {@value}.
053     */
054    public static final String KEYWORD = "xmlns";
055
056        /*------------*\
057    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
058        \*------------*/
059    /**
060     *  The namespace identifier.
061     */
062    private final URI m_Identifier;
063
064    /**
065     *  The namespace prefix.
066     */
067    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
068    private final Optional<String> m_Prefix;
069
070        /*------------------------*\
071    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
072        \*------------------------*/
073    /**
074     *  The serial version UID for objects of this class: {@value}.
075     *
076     *  @hidden
077     */
078    @Serial
079    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
080
081        /*--------------*\
082    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
083        \*--------------*/
084    /**
085     *  Creates a new {@code Namespace} instance without a prefix.
086     *
087     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
088     */
089    public Namespace( final URI identifier )
090    {
091        this( Optional.empty(), identifier );
092    }   //  Namespace()
093
094    /**
095     *  Creates a new {@code Namespace} instance without a prefix.
096     *
097     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
098     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
099     */
100    public Namespace( final String identifier ) throws URISyntaxException
101    {
102        this( Optional.empty(), new URI( requireNotEmptyArgument( identifier, "identifier" ) ) );
103    }   //  Namespace()
104
105    /**
106     *  Creates a new {@code Namespace} instance.
107     *
108     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
109     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
110     */
111    public Namespace( final String prefix, final URI identifier )
112    {
113        this( Optional.of( requireNotEmptyArgument( prefix, "prefix" ) ), identifier );
114    }   //  Namespace()
115
116    /**
117     *  Creates a new {@code Namespace} instance.
118     *
119     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
120     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
121     *  @throws URISyntaxException  The provided URI String is invalid.
122     */
123    public Namespace( final String prefix, final String identifier ) throws URISyntaxException
124    {
125        this( Optional.of( requireNotEmptyArgument( prefix, "prefix" ) ), new URI( requireNotEmptyArgument( identifier, "identifier" ) ) );
126    }   //  Namespace()
127
128    /**
129     *  Creates a new {@code Namespace} instance.
130     *
131     *  @param  prefix  The namespace prefix.
132     *  @param  identifier  The namespace identifier.
133     */
134    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
135    private Namespace( final Optional<String> prefix, final URI identifier )
136    {
137        if( prefix.isPresent() && !getPrefixValidator().test( prefix.get() ) )
138        {
139            throw new InvalidXMLNameException( prefix.get() );
140        }
141
142        m_Prefix = prefix;
143        m_Identifier = requireNonNullArgument( identifier, "identifier" );
144    }   //  Namespace()
145
146        /*---------*\
147    ====** Methods **==========================================================
148        \*---------*/
149    /**
150     *  {@inheritDoc}
151     */
152    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject", "NullableProblems"} )
153    @Override
154    public final int compareTo( final Namespace o )
155    {
156        requireNonNullArgument( o, "o" );
157
158        final var retValue = m_Prefix.isPresent()
159            ? (o.m_Prefix.isPresent() ? Integer.signum( m_Prefix.orElseThrow().compareTo( o.m_Prefix.orElseThrow() ) ) : 1)
160            : (o.m_Prefix.isPresent() ? -1 : 0);
161
162        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
163        return retValue;
164    }   //  compareTo()
165
166    /**
167     *  {@inheritDoc}
168     */
169    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject"} )
170    @Override
171    public final boolean equals( final Object obj )
172    {
173        var retValue = this == obj;
174        if( !retValue && obj instanceof Namespace other )
175        {
176            retValue = m_Prefix.equals( other.m_Prefix ) && m_Identifier.equals( other.m_Identifier );
177        }
178
179        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
180        return retValue;
181    }
182
183    /**
184     *  Returns the namespace identifier.
185     *
186     *  @return The namespace identifier.
187     */
188    public final URI getIdentifier() { return m_Identifier; }
189
190    /**
191     *  Returns the namespace prefix.
192     *
193     *  @return An instance of
194     *      {@link Optional}
195     *      that holds the namespace prefix.
196     */
197    public final Optional<String> getPrefix() { return m_Prefix; }
198
199    /**
200     *  {@inheritDoc}
201     */
202    @Override
203    public final int hashCode() { return hash( m_Prefix, m_Identifier ); }
204
205    /**
206     *  {@inheritDoc}
207     */
208    @Override
209    public final String toString()
210    {
211        final var retValue = m_Prefix
212            .map( p -> format( "%s:%s=\"%s\"", KEYWORD, p, m_Identifier.toString() ) )
213            .orElseGet( () -> format( "%s=\"%s\"", KEYWORD, m_Identifier.toString() ) );
214
215        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
216        return retValue;
217    }   //  toString()
218}
219//  class Namespace
220
221/*
222 *  End of File
223 */
